title: There's a huge flaw in Man United's reported plan to sign Ivan Perisic - the Red Devils supporters DON'T want him
text:

Ivan Perisic has been linked with a move to Manchester United. 
And the Old Trafford club are believed to be leading the way in securing the Inter Milan striker's signature, after Jose Mourinho was spotted watching Croatia's 1-0 win over Ukraine. 
The Portuguese claimed he was not on a scouting mission, and was in fact in the country to escape "the rainy weather in Manchester". 
But Mourinho's sheer presence abroad - and the possibility of the link - would surely cause a wave of excitement among the Red Devils supporters, right? Ivan Perisic is on the radar of a number of teams (Photo: FC Internazionale) Maybe I haven't thought this through? (Photo: REUTERS) 
After all, Perisic has found the back of the net nine times for Inter this season, and he is capable of all these other things too. 
However, it seems United fans are anything but happy about their club being linked with the Croatian. In fact they're quite annoyed about it. Don't you want me baby? (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) 
Why? May well you ask. 
Well, according to the vocal supporters who took to Twitter in a bid to reach out to Mourinho and put him off the transfer, there are a number of reasons, including: Whether he is an upgrade.
